text: Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: even as much as almsfood, it (the cloth) is to be forfeited and confessed.
โดยที่สุดแม้สักว่าบิณฑบาต เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
even a little alms-food. this entails expiation with forfeiture.
